# Susan Wang - Short Biography  

### Introduction 

My name is Susan Wang. From 2017 to 2021, I studied at [`Tufts University`](https://www.tufts.edu/), double majoring in Economics and International Relations.

Now I'm an MFA student at [`London Business School`](https://www.london.edu).  

### About This Portfolio Website

I include 5 projects in this portfolio website. All the projects are from course `Data Analytics for Finance`, and are done by my study group A8 (I have an amazing group).

A brief overview of the projects: 

* Project 1 Alcohol Consumption analyzes the consumption of beer, wine, and spirits of different countries.
* Project 2 Climate Change is a project about weather anomalies and the effect of increasing temperature.
* Project 3 Omega Group Salaries explores the pay discrimination problem at the Omega Group.
* Project 4 CPI and Components analyzes a subset of the CPI components change over the past few years.
* Project 5 GDP and Components compares GDP components for two groups of countries: the US, Germany, India; as well as China, Peru, and Spain.
